name: Feels Like HOME! Flies Away!
description:
Play it here!

The Sanctity of our Home can be easily shattered by the the presence of these disgusting crazy flying bugs. They reproduce everywhere and contaminate your house, act quietly so your house can become cozy and clean!

Made more or less  in 24h for the 2019 Game Jam  :)

Credits: 

Idea Master and Game Artist - Renata Candeias_ renatacandeias@gmail.com
Game Design, Programing and Catering - Tiago Carita_ tiagocarita@gmail.com

Sound effects from FreeSound.org
